weapons.Description: A lime-coloured bow, its golden crests are covered in blood. The weapon for those who wish to attack quickly, catching their enemies off guard.
A blood red spear, stained from countless fights. The jack-of-all trades weapon, with range, excellent damage and blocking potential.
A golden broadsword, with edges so sharp it may split the sky in half. The weapon for those who wish to defeat their adversaries in one fell swoop.
A brown and white shield, worn out from countless attacks. The weapon for those who wish to keep themselves safe, whilst waiting for the chance to counter attack.
